java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.index.ctagsindexer.CTagsFileReader.parse(CTagsFileReader.java:101)
at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.index.ctagsindexer.CTagsIndexAll.execute(CTagsIndexAll.java:114)
at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.search.processing.JobManager.run(JobManager.java:466)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:552)

Sorry I can't provide any source but it looks like this is triggered when it tries to index source files that are 
outside your workspace.  The CTagsFileReader.rootDirectory variable is null.

Created an attachment (id=26036)
patch to set root directory
